name: lyrion-music-server
description: Slimserver (Logitech Media Server) is a self-hosted streaming platform for music playback. It supports multi-room audio, plugins, and a variety of streaming clients for local or networked media collections.
features: Music Streaming: Local library streaming, Multi-format support, High-quality audio. Stream your music collection.
Multi-Room Audio: Synchronized playback, Multiple zones, Group players. Play music throughout your home.
Plugin System: Extend functionality, Streaming services, Custom features. Add capabilities with plugins.
Client Support: Web interface, Mobile apps, Hardware players. Access music from any device.
Library Management: Automatic scanning, Metadata management, Playlist support. Organize your music library.
Internet Radio: Stream radio stations, Podcast support, Online services. Access online audio content.
Remote Access: Web-based control, Mobile control, API access. Control playback from anywhere.
Open Source: Community-driven, Active development, Free forever. Mature music server platform.
